About

I am a full-stack developer, from web to mobile, with more expertise in iOS and Python. I strive to constantly learn new technologies as part of an endless quest of self-improvement and dabbling.

I create software with the user in mind, creating applications with an intuitive user interface experience. I understand the importance of creating highly readable, maintainable, and extensible source code, but shipping trumps perfection when it's crunch time.

Contact Me

Nokbox

Nokbox - Shared directory and private communication for your workforce.

This image shows the Groups tab containing a user's personal and professional organizations.

  • Role: CTO
  • Date: Feb 2013 - Feb 2014
  • Platforms: iOS and mobile web

QiuQiu 丘丘

QiuQiu: An iOS app focused on mobile social matchmatching in China.

Features include: real-time chat, notification feed, animated match-making game, editable profile, and address book integration.

  • Role: Chief Mobile Architect
  • Date: Sep 2012 - Jan 2013
  • Platforms: iOS

This image shows the Taste Test feature, where users choose other potential daters based on both looks and background.

  • Role: Chief Mobile Architect
  • Date: Sep 2012 - Jan 2013
  • Platforms: iOS

HoodHot Travel

HoodHot Travel Taxi Guide: A mobile app designed to get you to the hottest venues in neighborhoods around the world.

Each Taxi Guide is a venue directory with taxi cards to indicate directions to drivers in their native language. Covered cities such as Beijing, Shanghai, Cairo, Buenos Aires, and more.

  • Role: CTO
  • Date: Since Nov 2009
  • Platforms: iOS and Android

HoodHot Travel

HoodHot Travel Taxi Guide: A mobile app designed to get you to the hottest venues in neighborhoods around the world.

Displayed above is an example Chinese taxi card, which would tell the driver where to go. Other features included: both online and offline maps, venue search, sorting by distance, and more.

  • Role: CTO
  • Date: Since Nov 2009
  • Platforms: iOS and Android

Little Laura and the Birthday Surprise

Each page of the story had highlighted text in sync with the audio readings. Users could rewind or fast-froward by swiping left and right

  • Role: CTO
  • Date: Oct 2011 - Aug 2012
  • Platforms: iOS (iPhone and iPad)

Little Laura and the Birthday Surprise

Words in the song lyrics rotate to reveal the Chinese writing. Parents could optionally record their children singing along.

  • Role: CTO
  • Date: Oct 2011 - Aug 2012
  • Platforms: iOS (iPhone and iPad)

Aveda

My Aveda Style: An iPhone app for finding hairstyles and learning how to apply them.

The Home tab shows the major features at a glance: finding new hair styles, taking a hair advisor quiz, live chat integration to speak with a hair expert, location finder, and more.

  • Role: Software Consultant at Tigerspike
  • Date: Apr 2011 - Jan 2012
  • Platforms: iOS

Aveda

My Aveda Style: An iPhone app for finding hairstyles and learning how to apply them.

The Find Styles tab lists hair types, suggesting specific Aveda products fetched from the company's API.

  • Role: Software Consultant at Tigerspike
  • Date: Apr 2011 - Jan 2012
  • Platforms: iOS

Aveda

The More tab lists various videos on achieving different hairstyles.
